text: Is there a way to access a custom property from the deal object in the design manager of the custom quotes : {{ personalization_token(‘template_data.quote.address_des_travaux’,‘’) }} This does not give me the property..
Hi, how can i add this header X-Frame-Options into my HubSpot account?

HubSpot automatically provisions SSL certificates and has domain wide security settings you can configure. Including minimum TLS version, HSTS headers, and more.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/domains-and-urls/ssl-and-domain-security-in-HubSpot>


Documentation on `x-frame-options` specifically can be found at <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/domains-and-urls/ssl-and-domain-security-in-HubSpot#additional-domain-security-settings-cms-hub-enterprise-only>
